channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-7695] hive stats issue when insert query is appending data into table
item.description:
When 'insert' is used to append (not overrite), the stats don't seem to get updated.

set hive.compute.query.using.stats=true;
 set hive.stats.autogather=true;         
//insert 4 rows
insert into table t2 select * from t1;
select count(*) from t2;
4
//insert 4 again (appending instead of overrite)
insert into table t2 select * from t1;
select count(*) from t2;
4
select * from t2;    
1
2
3
4
1
2
3
4
item.summary: hive stats issue when insert query is appending data into table

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: thejas attached test patch. update the stats while inserting. kindly check.
ashutoshc Will you be able to review this patch ?

Hi vasanthkumar Sorry I missed this jira. If you are still working on this jira. I am attaching test cases which can be used for this bug. Can you add these tests to verify your patch. After that, once you are ready with new patch it will be great if you can create a RB entry for it.
Similar fix as Vasanth's with test cases.
